original_text: Also, you must pour 1.5 litres of wine on the altar as a drink offering. The smell of the smoke from this sacrifice will please the Lord.
korean_text: 전제로 포도주 삼분의 일 힌을 드려 여호와 앞에 향기롭게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: Also, you must pour 1.5 litres of wine
on the altar as a drink offering
The smell of the smoke from this sacrifice
